mapper.insert: insert into product values(SQ_PDNO.nextval, #{product_name}, #{price}, #{product_quantity}, #{product_content}, default, #{product_startdate}, #{product_enddate}, #{weekend_yn}, #{weekday_yn}, sysdate, sysdate, default, #{category_code}, #{seller_id}, #{img_no})
mapper.select: select count(*) from product where seller_id = #{userId} and DELETE_YN = 'N'

select X.rnum, X.product_no, X.product_name, X.PRICE, X.PRODUCT_QUANTITY, X.PRODUCT_CONTENT, X.PROGRESS, X.PRODUCT_STARTDATE, X.PRODUCT_ENDDATE, X.WEEKEND_YN, X.WEEKDAY_YN, X.PRODUCT_DATE, X.PRODUCT_MODIFYDATE, X.DELETE_YN, X.CATEGORY_CODE, X.SELLER_ID, X.IMG_NO from ( select rownum as rnum, A.product_no, A.product_name, A.PRICE, A.PRODUCT_QUANTITY, A.PRODUCT_CONTENT, A.PROGRESS, A.PRODUCT_STARTDATE, A.PRODUCT_ENDDATE, A.WEEKEND_YN, A.WEEKDAY_YN, A.PRODUCT_DATE, A.PRODUCT_MODIFYDATE, A.DELETE_YN, A.CATEGORY_CODE, A.SELLER_ID, A.IMG_NO from ( select product_no, product_name, PRICE, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PROGRESS, PRODUCT_STARTDATE, PRODUCT_ENDDATE, WEEKEND_YN, WEEKDAY_YN, PRODUCT_DATE, PRODUCT_MODIFYDATE, DELETE_YN, CATEGORY_CODE, SELLER_ID, IMG_NO from product order by product_no desc) A where rownum <= (#{perPageNum} * #{page}) and SELLER_ID = #{seller_id} and delete_yn = 'N') X where X.rnum > #{pageStart}
select * from product a join product_category on CATEGORY_CODE = PCATEGORY_NO join product_img b on a.img_no = b.img_no where product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ( SELECT a.PRODUCT_NAME as PRODUCT_NAME, a.PRICE as PRICE, a.PRODUCT_QUANTITY as PRODUCT_QUANTITY, a.PRODUCT_CONTENT as PRODUCT_CONTENT, a.PRODUCT_STARTDATE as PRODUCT_STARTDATE, a.PRODUCT_ENDDATE as PRODUCT_ENDDATE, a.WEEKEND_YN as WEEKEND_YN, a.WEEKDAY_YN as WEEKDAY_YN, a.PRODUCT_MODIFYDATE as PRODUCT_MODIFYDATE, a.CATEGORY_CODE as CATEGORY_CODE FROM product a WHERE product_no = #{product_no} ) SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{product_name}, PRICE = #{price}, PRODUCT_QUANTITY = #{product_quantity}, PRODUCT_CONTENT = #{product_content}, PRODUCT_STARTDATE = #{product_startdate}, PRODUCT_ENDDATE = #{product_enddate}, WEEKEND_YN = #{weekend_yn}, WEEKDAY_YN = #{weekday_yn}, PRODUCT_MODIFYDATE = sysdate, CATEGORY_CODE = (select PCATEGORY_NO from PRODUCT_CATEGORY where PCATEGORY_NAME = #{pcategory_name} and SUB_PCATEGORY_NAME = #{sub_pcategory_name})

update product_img set FIRST_IMG = #{first_img}, SECOND_IMG = #{second_img}, THIRD_IMG = #{third_img}, FOURTH_IMG = #{fourth_img} where img_no = (select img_no from product where product_no = #{product_no})
